front.title: Peer Prefix Limits Exchange in BGP

abstract.t: This document proposes a mechanism to allow BGP peers to coordinate the setting of a limit on the number of prefixes which one BGP speaker will send to its peer. Coordination can prevent disruption of the peering session or discarding of routes, which can occur when a maximum prefix limit is configured on the 'receiving' peer, and the 'sending' peer exceeds the limit.
